name: QLFileThumbnailRequest
desc: A request to generate a thumbnail for a custom file type.

items.name: var maximumSize: CGSize
items.desc: The maximum accepted size of a thumbnail.

items.name: var minimumSize: CGSize
items.desc: The minimum accepted size of a thumbnail.

items.name: var scale: CGFloat
items.desc: The scale of the requested thumbnail.

items.name: var fileURL: URL
items.desc: The URL of the image file to use for the thumbnail.
